"Wallace": "I used to be part of a recon unit. I got to travel all over Retem..."
"But with the City being so low on manpower, I've been reassigned to defend it. I spend most of my time on guard admiring the view."
"Retem is a harsh place, full of harsh battles. But it still has plenty of beauty to see."
"Can I ask you to go and revisit one of my old favorite spots?"
"And please send me some image data when you get there. It's been a long time since I've seen that view."
"I'll send you the exact coordinates. I really appreciate this."
